questions.question: Features can be connected to Left and Right input ports interchangeably without an effect on the output of the FeatureJoiner.
If you change the FeatureJoiner's Join Mode to Inner, how many features appear in the Joined output port?

Following step 5 results in 80 features, including 15 from the <Rejected> port that have missing park names. Setting the Join Mode to Full on the FeatureJoiner outputs 80 features to the Joined port. These two sets of features are identical.
